list.description: Concertgoers slightly skew towards women in the 25-34 year age range. This audience is either looking for their next show or big event or on their way to a concert.

Movie Buffs are evenly distributed across genders and age groups. While everyone loves a good movie, this audience is passionate about keeping up-to-date about watching the latest movies. They usually use movie and cinema-related apps.
Music Lovers are evenly distributed across genders and are slightly more likely to appear in the 25-34-year-old age range.
Ticket Shoppers are evenly distributed across genders, often in the 25-34-year-old age group. This audience is always on the lookout for tickets to their next show or major event.

Over-the-Top (OTT) Device Owners are often men and are most likely in the 18-24-year-old and 25-34-year-old age groups. This audience wants to stream their favourite television and video content without being tied to a standard cable subscription service.

Subscription Content Streamers are evenly distributed across genders, and while nearly 50% are in the 18-24 and 25-34 age ranges, they are evenly distributed across all other age groups. This audience loves to stream content and is willing to pay a premium for premium entertainment.

Music Discovery Enthusiasts are evenly distributed across genders and are most likely in the 18-44-year-old age group. On the hunt for their next favourite song, this audience uses traditional music streaming and discovery music apps.
